description: âœ… Fixed critical Windows file_pattern GLOB bug via TDD. Removed platform-specific path normalization in src/database/files.rs:376-390. Root cause: Code converted forward slashes to backslashes on Windows, breaking GLOB matching against forward-slash storage per RELATIVE_PATHS_CONTRACT.md. Solution: Remove normalization entirely - database stores workspace-relative Unix-style paths, so user patterns work as-is. Added regression test test_fts_file_pattern_forward_slash_glob_matching with 5 test cases. Updated 2 obsolete tests that used absolute path storage. All 33 database tests pass. Memory system text search now works on Windows!
